embed.title: Gem
embed.description: Gems are precious currency. Use them wisely.

fields.name: Dos
fields.value:
• Acquiring hero shards through hero events (about 320k <:aowgem:847363788592119838> to get one hero to level 15).
• Temple of fusion (after you get a hero to level 15).
• Leveling troops to level-9.
• Extra arena battles

fields.name: Don'ts
fields.value:
• Opening hero/troops chests.
• Opening Super Cards.
• Clan Wheel.
• Buying gold coins in the Shop page.
• Buying anything in the Mystic Shop.
• Buying troops in the Shop page.
• Buying additional troops during Lucky Draws.
• Honor Hunting demo

footer.text: Use `{PREFIX}info gem-purchase`, `{PREFIX}info idle-rewards`, `{PREFIX}info gem-battles`, `{PREFIX}info hero-event` for related information.
